74e52886-d43d-42ae-9e9a-7629505a074f.description:
Any activity which does not aim for more than a 10x impovement in the long run will be outcompeted.
Google.

baa31544-48ae-48db-8b44-3c65389566c6.description:
A good software does not have bugs. It just works - it might be simple or even dummy looking, but it just works without bugs.
A bug is like broken window - have several of them and the value of your building will go down straight to zero.
baa31544-48ae-48db-8b44-3c65389566c6.name: zero tolerance for bugs

b74cfbfb-5930-4555-8ef3-f6e2f1ba0032.description: Any application with missing,non-up-to-date or incorrect documentation is undermining the user-experience of its users on purpose.
